name: snyk-to-html
description: Convert JSON output from `snyk test --json` into a static HTML report

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run tap
scripts.report: mkdir -p output && cat sample-data/test-report.json | node dist/. > output/test-report.html && open output/test-report.html
scripts.report:cve: mkdir -p output && cat sample-data/test-report.json | node dist/. -t template/test-cve-report.hbs > output/test-report.html && open output/test-report.html
scripts.multi-report: mkdir -p output && cat sample-data/multi-test-report.json | node dist/. > output/multi-test-report.html && open output/multi-test-report.html

author: Snyk Ltd
